Title: Prohibits certain pre-K programs from requiring the influenza vaccine for children entering such programs
Summary: Prohibits certain pre-K programs from requiring the influenza vaccine for children entering such programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง2164, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting certain pre-K programs from requiring the influenza vaccine for children entering such programs
